definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Four days later, a headline about a burglary attracted his attention.
sentences.chinese: 四天後，一則有關盜竊案的標題新聞引起了他的注意。

sentences.english: On the bus I always manage to glance at the headlines in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 在公共汽車上我總是掃視一遍報紙上的標題新聞。
